meanings.definition: The most extreme or remarkable example of something.
meanings.sent1: In the talent show, Sarah's magic trick was the darnedest of all.
meanings.sent2: That roller coaster is the darnedest ride in the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The darnedest thing happened when the cat started dancing to the music.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to finish the marathon was the darnedest display of strength.
meanings.sent5: The storm last night was the darnedest I've ever seen, with lightning striking all around.

meanings.definition: Used for emphasis or to express surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Darnedest! I can't believe I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Well, darnedest, I missed the bus again.
meanings.sent3: Darnedest, the cat knocked over the vase again!
meanings.sent4: When I saw the price of the concert tickets, darnedest, I almost fainted.
meanings.sent5: Darnedest, it's raining so hard I can't even see the road ahead!
